text: August Zaleski (13 September 1883 â€“ 7 April 1972) was a Polish economist, politician, and diplomat. Twice Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Poland, he was the 6th President of Poland within the 2nd Polish Government in Exile from 9 June 1947 until 7 April 1972. == Other websites == * Biography Category:1883 births Category:1972 deaths Category:Presidents of Poland Category:Polish economists Category:Polish historians Category:Ambassadors of Poland Category:Writers from Warsaw Category:Freemasons Category:Anti- communists
title: August Zaleski
